title: Hugo Tameirão Seixas
text:
Working on the estimation of carbon sequestration by low carbon agriculture in Brazil.
Interested in using data to make inferences about ecological processes. Enthusiast of data analysis and visualization, open science, reproducibility and accessibility.

title: Publications
text:
2021
Relationship between Biomass Burning Emissions and Deforestation in Amazonia over the Last Two Decades. Forests. https://doi.org/10.3390/f12091217
2020 Pantanal’s widespread fire: short- and long-term implications for biodiversity and conservation. Biodiversity and Conservation. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10531-021-02243-2


2020
Rapid Recent Deforestation Incursion in a Vulnerable Indigenous Land in the Brazilian Amazon and Fire-Driven Emissions of Fine Particulate Aerosol Pollutants. Forests. https://doi.org/10.3390/f11080829
